description: Services require a user name and password that must be obtained from Encompass.  We issue a single set of credentials for all invironments.  Please make sure you are pointing to the correct endpoint described in the __servers__ section.  Services all return the elements `status->errorCode` and `status->errorMessage`.  Successful reqeusts will return a __100__ `errorCode`.   If you have any questions that are not answered here or would like to discuss the overall process, please contact your account rep to schedule a technical call.
